sentences.en: Once destroyed, brain cells do not regenerate.
sentences.cn: 脑细胞一旦遭到破坏，就不能再生。

sentences.en: Nerve cells have limited ability to regenerate if destroyed.
sentences.cn: 神经细胞如果被破坏其再生能力有限。

sentences.en: This involves moving young coral from a healthy reef onto a degraded reef, in an attempt to regenerate the degraded reef by encouraging young healthy coral to take over.
sentences.cn: 这涉及到把年轻珊瑚从一个健康珊瑚礁移到一个退化的珊瑚礁上，通过促进年轻健康的珊瑚来接管，试图使退化的珊瑚礁再生。
